subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: After serving a first-half suspension, Johnny Manziel threw three touchdown passes and drew an unsportsmanlike-conduct penalty in No. 7 Texas A&M’s 52-31 victory over Rice on Saturday.
snippet: After serving a first-half suspension, Johnny Manziel threw three touchdown passes and drew an unsportsmanlike-conduct penalty in No. 7 Texas A&M’s 52-31 victory over Rice on Saturday.
